name: Hex-A-Gone
description:
A two player game where you have to trap your opponent by removing tiles from the board, to destroy their chances of winning.

Each turn consists of two parts:
Step 1 - Move your piece to any adjacent tile.
Step 2 - Remove any tile from the board.

Players take it in turns to use the mouse.

Created for the 2019 OneLoneCoder.com jam, 8th September 2019
